attributes.action: Include not happy with any current political party on the next election paper
attributes.additional_details: I submit that the current impasse in the houses of commons and Lords and not following the will of the people of the United Kingdom is all the evidence required to prove the point
attributes.background: We the British people have for a long time been dismayed by the current political parties and would like a selection on the next ballot paper to prove this. If true we want all current members sacked and new people voted for by us the people of the United Kingdom
